title: Truck carrying lemons overturns on New Jersey highway: Police
description: A tractor-trailer carrying lemons overturned on a New Jersey highway on Wednesday, according to local authorities.

title: Jamaica advances to knockout in 2nd World Cup appearance thanks to crowdfunding
description: A GoFundMe called Reggae Girlz Rise Up has raised over $49,000 to go towards the Jamaica women's soccer teams World Cup costs.

title: Family pleads for help in search for missing Georgia mother of 4
description: The mother of a Georgia woman who vanished more than three weeks ago issued an emotional plea for help on Wednesday.

title: Library chief explains challenge to Arkansas law opening librarians to prosecution
description: A new Arkansas law that would have allowed criminal charges against librarians and booksellers for making “harmful” materials available to minors.

title: No gunman located after Capitol told to shelter in place over possible shooting
description: The Capitol Police Department is urging everyone inside the Senate buildings at the Capitol to shelter in place following a report of a "possible active shooter."

title: Pence says 'crackpot lawyers' told Trump what he wanted to hear
description: Reporters asked him what he's learned from reading the Jan. 6 indictment.

title: WATCH:  Man in custom-made dog outfit gets taken for a walk
description: A Japanese man, who has reportedly spent close to $16,000 on a realistic border collie outfit, takes a stroll outdoors in the bizarre costume.

title: WATCH:  Worker dodges hungry gator during feeding time
description: THINK FAST: A worker dived to escape the jaws of a huge alligator during feeding time at a reptile rescue park.

title: Mom of 4 dies after falling on treadmill mid-workout
description: Delrie Rosario, a mom of four from Washington, has died after falling during a workout and hitting her head on a treadmill machine.

title: 65 million Americans under heat alerts across the South
description: Some 65 million Americans are under heat alerts as a heat dome sits over parts of the South.

title: American fugitive who faked death can be extradited to face rape charge: UK judge
description: U.S. authorities said the man has used several aliases over the years.

title: WWE's McMahon served with subpoena by federal agents
description: Federal law enforcement agents executed a search warrant and served a federal grand jury subpoena to WWE Executive Chairman Vince McMahon last month, according to a regulatory filing

title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau separating from wife, Sophie
description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is splitting up with his wife, Sophie, according to the leader's Instagram page.

title: Why are gas prices rising? Experts point to extreme heat and oil production cuts
description: Drivers are in for another headache at the pump as gas prices continue to rise.

title: Florida set to execute James Phillip Barnes in nurse's 1988 hammer killing
description: Florida is preparing to execute a man convicted of strangling his wife and brutally murdering another woman years earlier

title: Body recovered from New York City creek identified as Goldman Sachs analyst
description: A body recovered from a New York City creek has been identified as a 27-year-old Goldman Sachs analyst, according to police.

title: Pittsburgh synagogue massacre: Jury reaches verdict in death penalty phase
description: A federal jury has decided whether convicted Pittsburgh synagogue mass shooter Robert Bowers will be sentenced to death.

title: 'Horrific' early morning attack by 4 large dogs leaves man in his 70s dead in road
description: Four large dogs have attacked and killed a man in his 70s in an early morning “unprovoked” attack in the middle of the road that police are calling “horrific.”

title: Trump 2020 election charges live updates: Former president calls indictment 'pile-on'
description: Live updates on the criminal charges facing former President Donald Trump in connection with his alleged attempts to overturn the result of the 2020 election.

title: Sweden wins Group G at Women's World Cup to advance to showdown with the US
description: Rebecka Blomqvist’s second-half goal lifted Sweden to a 2-0 win over Argentina on Wednesday

title: A powerful typhoon pounds Japan's Okinawa and injures more than 20 people
description: A powerful typhoon has slammed Okinawa and other islands in southwestern Japan Wednesday with high winds injuring more than 20 people as it moved west making its way toward mainland China

title: US soldier dead after German highway truck crash
description: The U.S. military says an American soldier died when a truck hit his Stryker armored vehicle on a highway in southern Germany

title: 29 inches of rain was Beijing's heaviest rainfall in at least 140 years
description: China’s capital has recorded its heaviest rainfall in at least 140 years over the past few days

title: 1 dead, 9 injured after wrong-way vehicle crash on Maryland highway, police say
description: A woman died and nine others were injured after a vehicle travelling the wrong way on Maryland's Capital Beltway on Tuesday evening, Maryland State Police said.

title: Striking writers, studios to meet this week to discuss restarting negotiations
description: Union leaders told have told striking Hollywood writers that they plan to meet with representatives for studios to discuss restarting negotiations

title: North Korea calls US human rights envoy a 'political housemaid' in protest
description: North Korea on Wednesday hurled misogynistic insults at a newly confirmed United States special envoy to monitor the country’s human rights issues and warned of unspecified security consequences if Washington continues to criticize its human rights con...

title: Grand Canyon bus rollover kills 1, leaves more than 50 injured
description: One person is dead and more than 50 people have been injured after a bus rolled over at the Grand Canyon on Tuesday, authorities say.

title: Trump indictment: Who are the 'Co-Conspirators'?
description: The indictment against former President Donald Trump references, but does not name, six other "co-conspirators" who took actions alongside Trump.

title: SUV plows into pedestrians on a busy New York City sidewalk while fleeing from police
description: New York City police say a man driving a stolen SUV struck a group of pedestrians on a Midtown Manhattan sidewalk near Grand Central Terminal and injured 10 people

title: 1 dead, over 50 others hurt in tour bus rollover at Grand Canyon West
description: Authorities say one person has died and more than 50 others were injured in a rollover involving a tour bus in northern Arizona
